/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy over the road. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sides of the road, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow. The road itself is busy with several cars and trucks moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise serene landscape. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day on a highway in Beijing, with its blend of natural beauty and urban life.
